Package arb.stochastic.dynamics

Class WienerProcess

java.lang.Object
arb.stochastic.dynamics.WienerProcess
All Implemented Interfaces:
LévyProcess, StochasticProcess
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrownianMotion
public class WienerProcess extends Object implements LévyProcess
The Wiener process W(t) is an integral of the white-noise GaussianProcess characterized by the following properties:
1. W(0) = 0
2. W has independent increments: for every t > 0 the future increments W(t+u)-W(t)∀u≥0 are independent of the past values {W(s):s≤t}
3. W has Gaussian increments: W(t+u)−W(t) is normally distributed with mean 0 and variance u with W(t+u)−W(t)∼N(0,u)
4. W has continuous paths: W(t) is continuous in t
Author:
crow
